location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Captain George Brown Walker, Commander of the HC Cruizer Benaresat Bushire to Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is reporting on the Captain's visits to Debuy [Dubai] and Sharga [Shargah], as ordered by the Resident. The letter details the proceedings of the Captain's investigation into a complaint made against Shaikh Soliman bin Nassau of Debuy by Sultan bin Sugger [Sulṭān bin Saqr]; Shailk Soliman is accused of having seized ten boats belonging to Sharga.The letter also notes that the in the process of the investigation the HC Cruizer Benaresrendezvoused with the HC Cruizer Antelope, which was investigating reports that boats belonging to the people of Linga [Bandar-e-Lengeh] and Sharga have been seized by the people of Debuy.
